DocAttribute.Name: Closed
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication whether the _IfcPolygonalFaceSet_ is a closed shell or not. If omited no such information can be provided.

DocAttribute.Name: Faces
DocAttribute.Documentation: The list of polygonal faces, with or without inner loops, that bound the faceted face set.

DocAttribute.Name: PnIndex
DocAttribute.Documentation: The list of integers defining the locations in the _IfcCartesianPointList3D_ to obtain the point coordinates for the indices at the indexed polygonal faces. If the _PnIndex_ is not provided the indices at the indexed polygonal faces point directly into the _IfcCartesianPointList3D_.
